    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render​(Graphics2D g,
                   Rectangle area)
        Description copied from interface: CanvasRenderer
        Draw on the canvas. The provided area can be the full visible part of the canvas or a damaged region. Zooming, clipping... is performed by the canvas before calling this method.
        Specified by:
        render in interface CanvasRenderer
        Parameters:
        g - the clipped graphics object
        area - the area to redraw

      • overlay

        public void overlay​(Graphics2D g,
                    Rectangle area)
        Description copied from interface: CanvasRenderer
        Draw temporary information on top of the canvas. It can be used to represent moving objects or other temporary information.
        Specified by:
        overlay in interface CanvasEventManager
        Specified by:
        overlay in interface CanvasRenderer
        Parameters:
        g - the clipped graphics object
        area - the area to redraw

      • updateSelectionCache

      • damageItem

        public void damageItem​(Object item)
        Mark an item as needing redraw. This will call damageCanvas according to the item's bounds. Note: It does NOT call repaint() to let several calls happen before the actual redraw.
        Parameters:
        item -
